My Literature Review
=============================================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   2020/index

   
Method
=============================================

**First pass: in this section, answer the below questions to decide whether this paper is useful for deep reading.**

1. Category - the type of the paper (measurement, analysis of existing work, survey or introduce new algorithm)
2. Context - is there any other related work? Or, what is the theoretical background
3. Correctness
4. Contribution
	
**Second Pass: in this section, try to answer three main questions:**

1. What does it do?
2. How does it do it? (method detail)
3. What did it find? (model evaluation, experiment comparison, and results)

**Third Pass: Strengths and weakness**
